Name: IgKnight Golf Defender
About the game: What happens when Golf + Tower Defense + Magic in Virtual Reality? Welcome to IgKnight Golf Defender where you are armed with a magical golf hammer that can launch cannonball that explodes or magical attacks. This virtual reality game uses a golfing-like physics and tower defense mechanics to create a unique experience. There are 50 waves to defend against the invading demon army. Practise your aim to hit them far away for a higher score. Utilize the 4 different magic to efficiently take out different enemy formations. Check leaderboard to see how you rank among the IgKnight warriors. Level Editor Finished all levels? Too easy for you? Create your own level using our simple text-based editor. More info can be found in the guides section. Share your level in our discussion boards and see who can beat your challenge! Custom controller version Use a real golf club and Vive tracker for the most realistic experience. (We can make one for you or provide some guidelines for making a custom controller) Others Custom version available now to reskin the game for commercial or event usage. Add logo branding and modern environments. We have also made custom versions using the same golf mechanics for a simple distance hitting challenge and accuracy challenge with local leaderboard. Designed and optimized for corporate and private events. -b816oH01Y Contact us now at -vr.com/ if you want to enquire more.
